thread.title: BRIEF-Newgen Software Technologies Gets Order For Digitization Project Of District, Tehsil Courts In Madhya Pradesh

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Newgen Software Technologies Gets Order For Digitization Project Of District, Tehsil Courts In Madhya Pradesh

organizations.name: brief-newgen software technologies gets order for digitization project of district

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Newgen Software Technologies Ltd :
* CO GOT WORK ORDER FOR DIGITIZATION PROJECT OF DISTRICT COURTS, TEHSIL COURTS IN MADHYA PRADESH ON TURNKEY BASIS
* SAYS TOTAL SIZE OF WORK ORDER IS 53.2 MILLION RUPEES Source text - bit.ly/2Ft7DMl Further company coverage:
